lines.text: Well, nobody can stop time forever, Paul.
What do you mean? Why not?
Well, when time stops, nothing grows. Not a plant, not animals, not even boys.
You mean you can't stop them? They can still blow up the bridge?
If time doesn't go forward, you won't be able to grow up.
I don't wanna grow up and be like those men on the bridge! Chasing gold, and blowing up things! Grown-ups are all stupid.
Not all, Paul. You're a thoughtful and loving person. You can still be you even if you do grow up.
